amazon_sale_report.description: This table provides detailed insights into Amazon sales data, including SKU Code, Design Number, Stock, Category, Size and Color, to help optimize product profitability. One row represents one sale.

columns.sales_channel_: channel through which order was made
columns.ship_service_level: Type of shipping priority of order
columns.amount: Amount of revenue generated by the sale. This is the total sale amount. Summing this column gives the total revenue (total gross sales) generated by the sales.
columns.currency: The currency used for the sale.
columns.ship_city: which city the order was shipped to
columns.ship_state: which state the order was shipped to
columns.ship_postal_code: which postal code the order was shipped to
columns.ship_country: Which country the order was shipped to, data is currently only for India so only IN values
columns.promotion_ids: ID of the promotion code that the order was associated with

cloud_warehouse_compersion_chart.description: This table provides a comparison of the profitability of different e-commerce sales channels

columns.shiprocket: This column contains data related to the profitability of e-commerce sales through Shiprocket.
columns.increff: This column contains data related to the profitability of e-commerce sales through INCREFF.

expense_iigf.description: This table contains financial information on expenses to help optimize product profitability

columns.recived_amount: The total amount of money received from sales.

international_sale_report.description: This table provides detailed information on international sales, including customer, style, SKU, size, pieces, rate, and gross amount

may22.description: This table in the dataset contains sales data from May 2022, including SKU Code, Design Number, Stock, Category, Size and Color, to help optimize product profitability

columns.final_mrp_old: Final price of the product after discounts.
columns.ajio_mrp: Price of the product on Ajio.
columns.amazon_mrp: Price of the product on Amazon.
columns.amazon_fba_mrp: Price of the product on Amazon FBA.
columns.flipkart_mrp: Price of the product on Flipkart.
columns.limeroad_mrp: Price of the product on Limeroad.
columns.myntra_mrp: Price of the product on Myntra.
columns.paytm_mrp: Price of the product on Paytm.
columns.snapdeal_mrp: Price of the product on Snapdeal.

columns.final_mrp_old: Final price of the product after discounts.

sale_report.description: This table provides detailed information on e-commerce sales, including SKU Code, Design Number, Stock, Category, Size and Color, to help optimize product profitability.
